attributes.action: Limit on teenage car insurance premium
attributes.additional_details: Teenagers who want to drive should pay car insurance like every other driver. The problem is that they have to pay in excess of £5000. This is far too much for a very large majority to afford. All teenagers should have to pay normal adult premiums which are around £350 - £450. If they even have a small accident because of dangerous driving the the limit should be lifted but teenagers that respect the law and drive carefully should not have to pay the price.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
